attributes.action: Instant ban for drivers caught holding a mobile phone whilst driving a vehicle.
attributes.additional_details:
2006 (M3) lorry driver kills 23 year old woman: http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/hampshire/5252872.stm

August 2016 (A34) lorry driver kills 4 people: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-37823457
attributes.background:
The awful news of yet more deaths by a driver using a mobile phone must raise the question; is the penalty for mobile phone use whilst driving tough enough. The answer is clearly "NO". 
BAN ANY DRIVER CAUGHT WITH A MOBILE IN THEIR HAND : IT'S WORSE THAN DRINK DRIVING AND IS COSTS LIVES.
